moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Gather IPSwitch iMail User Data Enumeration
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module will collect iMail user data such as the username, domain,
        full name, e-mail, and the decoded password.  Please note if IMAILUSER is
        specified, the module extracts user data from all the domains found.  If
        IMAILDOMAIN is specified, then it will extract all user data under that
        particular category.
author: sinn3r <sinn3r@metasploit.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.
